Links to default Webel JSF/PrimeFaces example test pages

Please feel welcome to copy, rename, re-author (via the XHTML page comment headers), and adapt the JSF/PrimeFaces test pages these link to:

Please DO NOT directly edit the classes FakeEntity, FakeQuery, and ViewBean or you may break the example test pages ! TIP: If you are sure you won't need the example test pages again simply delete the entire /web/examples/ folder,
but please don't delete the Java classes FakeEntity, FakeQuery, and ViewBean, you may still need them. TIP: Please introduce new links with <h:link> to your NEW clearly described test case pages in the dedicated fieldset below !
If you have issue numbers for related support tickets please include them in your link descriptions(s).
